author: radup
msg: Fix for XMLBEANS-46 in the V1 branch.

author: wrowe
msg: Coexist with multiple releases of APR, we only promise to die

author: wrowe
msg: APR_FILEPATH_NOTABOVEROOT was undefined with a left-hand NULL
or empty path.  The SECUREROOTPATH and NOTABSOLUTE tests were
sufficient for this application.  Adjusts for a bug in earlier
versions of APR with this undefined value.
